DOC.brief_summary: This study is intended to evaluate whether intravenous (iv) esomeprazole (Nexium® ) offers better intragastric acid suppression than iv lansoprazole (Prevacid ®
DOC.brief_title: Study of 24-hour Intragastric pH Profiles of Esomeprazole 40 mg and Lansoprazole 30 mg in Healthy Volunteer Subjects
DOC.criteria: Participants must be 1870 years of age Participants can be male or female Women that are able to have children must have a negative pregnancy test. Involvement in or planning of this study Participation in another clinical study within 28 days of this one For women, pregnancy or attempting to become pregnant.
DOC.keyword: N/A this study is being conducted with healthy volunteers
